deities.name: Memzoal
deities.title: The Rootborn Warden and Verdant Breath of Becoming
deities.tenet: From decay sprouts life; the end is the beginning.
deities.depiction: A massive serpent biting its own tail, scales etched with forests, oceans, and mountains.
deities.worship: His followers meditate in silence, studying life’s cycles. His priests and druids act as keepers of balance, stepping in only when nature falters.
